name: Anemoiapolis
summary:
You have fallen into a strange and haunted underground neighborhood. Discover its origins and escape with your life - and sanity - intact. 
 
Anemoiapolis is a short atmospheric terror game about liminal spaces. Have you ever been in an empty airport, or a school at night? This game attempts to recreate that experience.
